entry.title: Where Even Ice Can Thaw
entry.summary:
Author: WriterDMathis

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,364Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: In the frozen silence of his Blackgate cell, Victor Fries expects only cold and loneliness. But on Christmas night, unexpected visitors arrive with gifts that thaw the memories of the snow-queen he lost. For one night, even the coldest heart in Gotham may remember how to feel.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 177,406Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 326

Summary: ‚ÄúOh, you do like to flirt, don‚Äôt you?‚Äù Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entr√©e: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn‚Äôt help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. ‚ÄúFlirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‚ÄòEverything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power‚Äô. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you‚Äôve got the whole world in your hands.‚Äù After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can‚Äôt escape.

entry.title: Chapter 4; Dark Age
entry.summary:
Author: Corvix_Ailuranthrope_4313

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,757Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Point Break, the meteor that had hit the Planet Earth, had almost destroyed the world in its entirety, there was chaos everywhere now, no law, no order, monsters had ruled the streets with no fear of the dark, and this Batman was on his own with nothing but his wits and willpower, would he survive in this chaos and help Gotham rebuild? Or will Gotham finally fall once and for all this time around?

entry.title: Another Perspective
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,889Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 376

Summary: A clash of opposing plans causes Batman to accidentally be doused with a hybrid of not-quite-Fear Toxin and Ivy's pheromones. In order to cope with the opposing influences, his brain convinces him that the four Rogues who were keyed to them - Scarecrow, Ivy, Harley Quinn, and Riddler - have been deaged into children. Obviously he'll have to bring them home and look after them until an antidote is made. Meanwhile, by order of the Batkids in order to NOT break Batman's mind, said Rogues are forced to play along.

entry.title: Life in Gotham, but Gotham Knows Everything
entry.summary:
Author: swanproposal

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,560Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 90

Summary: Listen, Bruce Wayne was great at the whole secret identity thing. Or he had been until all the Robins started popping up. There's only so many coincidences that the people of Gotham can ignore until it clicks. And when child after child started popping up in Wayne manor, and a matching child popped out from Batman's cape, there was no denying it anymore. So yes, Gotham knew that Batman was Brucie, who was also Bruce Wayne. But if the only thing that kept that man sane was dressing up in a bat costume and protecting the city then who were they to stop him? And so the game began. Everyone knew Batman's identity (except the black haired, blue eyed kids although even that backfired eventually) and Gotham would do everything to protect Bruce from the knowledge that yes, the entire city did actually know what he got up to in his free time. Shenanigans ensue.

entry.title: A Truce Written in Blood and Shadow
entry.summary:
Author: Hero_Iron_Dad

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,465Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: During a clash with Scarecrow, Robin‚Äôs mask shatters, and fear toxin hits with full force. But instead of cowering in terror, Damian Wayne begins calling out for someone the Bat-family has never heard of. When a portal rips open in the heart of Gotham and a mysterious girl in a violet cloak emerges from the darkness, Bruce discovers that his sixteen-year-old son harbors a secret far more powerful than any Justice League mission. A secret named Raven, bound to Damian by a vow that no one can break.Spoiler: Jason is in shock, Dick is on the verge of tears, and Damian treats his wife like a goddess‚Äîwhich is arguably the weirdest thing Batman has ever seen.

entry.title: Why The Robins Came Home
entry.summary:
Author: Smarty2604

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,149Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 23

Summary: Dick shows up with twins and a letter that changes everything. Jason comes home with a daughter and a heartbreak he can't fix, no matter how hard he tried. Damian returns without warning, carrying two sons‚Äîmore responsibility than he‚Äôs ever known, and the certainty that he has no room left for pride. And Tim‚ÄîTim's world has shattered in a way that he doesn't know if he'll come back from. But he has to. For his son. Two weeks doesn‚Äôt sound like long‚Äîuntil you‚Äôre raising a baby alone. One by one, the Robins come home carrying infants, exhaustion, and a grief that refuses to wait for you to be ready. The kind that doesn't care how strong you are. What they find isn‚Äôt a mission or a mantle‚Äîbut a family learning how to stand still long enough to heal. Bruce Wayne expects a productive day at the Batcomputer.Instead, he gets his sons back in a single heartbreaking evening. This is where the legacy begins.This is why the Robins came home.

entry.title: the eigth wonder of the world (you)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,558Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 1,121

Summary: Bruce Wayne meets Clark Kent, who he knows is Superman, and decides to mess with him as a way to see how long it will take him to piece together that the billionarie airhead playboy from Gotham is, in fact, the Knight of Darkness; Batman. If he's going to reveal himself, he's gonna have some fun first. Meanwhile, Superman, Clark Kent, Kal-El, whatever have you is very confused. Bruce Wayne is coming onto him whether he's in suit or not, and... he can't possibly know, right? But Batman is stoic as every, even if he is convincing him to, "Give it a try, Kal. If the date goes bad, freeze him." The Justice League gets convinced that Batman is dating someone in Gotham (when he really wants to date the Man of Steel), unaware he's calling home to his... however many kids that the man actually has. Shenanagins, introductions of all Robins and Gotahm vigilantes enuse, Green Lantern swears he sees Batman smile, but nobody believes him, and Clark falls deeper in love with both of Bruce Wayne's sides, and even the little hidden part he keeps to himself, too. He can't believe this is happeneing to him.

entry.title: The ciphers in Gotham

entry.title: I will find you, whenever you are
entry.summary:
Author: Florchus

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,969Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 48

Summary: One mistake. One device. Four Robins lost in time. Dick, Jason, Tim, and Damian are scattered across time. Separated from each other, and from the present, they must survive unfamiliar eras, unravel what happened, and find a way home. Meanwhile, Bruce Wayne is left behind with an empty Batcave and one impossible question: where did his sons go?

entry.title: Talk 'Till There's No Lies
entry.summary:
Author: Skeletons_InYourCloset

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,343Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 67

Summary: For the record, Hal would like to say this was not his fault. After all, that girl was really hot‚Äîthink of a desert storm wrapped in a human form, with hair like dust devils swirling in the sunset and a smile that could make a monk rethink his vows‚Äîand that's what he was up against. Anyone would‚Äôve been distracted, okay? Superman would've taken a little longer to blink. Batman would‚Äôve pretended he wasn‚Äôt affected, then brooded about it for six months. And Hal? Hal forgot where he was and long story short‚Äîshe kissed him. When he pulled back, dazed and grinning like an idiot, his ring was gone. Next thing he knew, he was waking up‚Äîhands cuffed, ring still absent, ego thoroughly bruised. Now, it wasn‚Äôt like this was Hal‚Äôs first time getting kidnapped. Far from it. But this? This was a first. No alien warlords. No cosmic entities. Just‚Ä¶ a woman hired to lure him in for some wacko wanting to get dirt on, here's the kicker, Spooky of all people. Crazy, right? Or, Hal gets kidnapped by your average Gotham crazy wanting to get a step ahead of Batman and ends up being saved like a damsel in distress. Bruce is, surprisingly, overprotective‚Äîbordering on solicitous‚Äîabout the whole thing.
